recipesJson.name: Circus Cookie Remix
recipesJson.author: dazcole
recipesJson.description:
This is a remix of the infamous circus cookie e liquid. It was created by 3 mixers including myself Aaron Vause and John N Jill Szollosi so credit has to go to all 3 of us. 
Many a long night was spent creating this e liquid and finally after 8 versions between as all we came up with this finished version which all all agreed is very tasty.
Here are some notes.

FA cookie / cap sugar cookie / FW hazelnut 

This created the cookie Base for the recipe we decided on cap sugar cookie for the main staple for the cookie but it does tend to hide behind other flavourings so needed some boost to make it shine.  A small amount of fa cookie and FW hazelnut gives the cookie abit more weight and flavour and makes the cookie more enjoyable and noticeable on the exhale. Without the additions the exhale was somewhat lacking the texture of a hearty cookie.

Cap butter cream

This adds the butter cream into the cookie and rounds of what otherwise would be a dry biscuit flavour. 

FA meringue / fa marshmallow / Tfa VBIC / fa joy

This creates the icing that you find on circus cookies and totally plays an important role in the recipe.  We could of gone with loranns cream cheese icing but it tends to overpower and gives a waxy texture that seems to artificial. Adding meringue boosts the sweetness alongside adding weight to the marshmallow which is the star of the show.  The VBIC combined with the meringue and marshmallow creates a perfect icing that totally works in conjunction with the cookie. FA joy is the magical addition that ties the icing together and creates the sprinkles over the icing.

INW shisha Strawberry 

The recipe required a candy Strawberry flavour for the icing and after playing with capella sweet Strawberry it didn't cut the mustard and faded considerably with the other ingredients so after playing around with INW shisha Strawberry again a Strawberry known for its candy aspects we found it a bolder Strawberry that held its own against the other flavours and worked in its favour.

So imagine the experience you get that full on bold Strawberry inhale that turns into creamy icing with sprinkles that ignites buttery cookie. Perfect all day vape experience that will want you lusting for more. 
Enjoy.. 

Add sweetener should you wish

0.5% seems to be the sweet spot.

STEEP TIME 5 DAYS

reviews.text: I've been vaping this off and on for a long time but like most people i can barely stand FA joy so i cut it in half but now i switch it with FW sprinkles at 1.4% so if your like me try this instead overall great juice.
Solid well balanced recipe. I would like a little more strawberry, love the Marshmallow it adds some sweetness as well as some gooeiness to the icing and the cookie
A bit heavy on the strawberry to be a true circus cookie for me, but names aside, still a great recipe.
In my top 5 recipes ever.  This stuff is fantastic! I've vaped close to 500ml of this and its still going strong in my rotation.
Steeped for 6 days, this is fantastic.  Highly recommended.
This is really good after a week, thanks for this recipe.

I'm entering a score of 5 without the FA joy. With it it's a 1 star just because I'm so sensitive to that flavor and even .5% all I get is beer. But without it and I upped the butter cream to 1.5% I definitely get a circus cookie! So great job achieving that! I tried to tackle this profile a few years ago and it's not easy to get that circus cookie flavor to shine. Again anyone that is sensitive to FA Joy I suggest to just leave it out and you'll still get the profile!!

Had this steeping for a couple weeks, and so far the shisha strawberry hasn't mellowed enough to let the cookie through. I think the reason why this doesn't taste like a circus cookie to most people is because the original pink frosted circus animal cookies aren't strawberry flavored. - just vanilla with pink food coloring, same as the white ones. If the strawberry calms down eventually this recipe could turn out great, but it's not going to bring back any childhood memories of stealing cookies from the cookie jar.

I'm not big on bakery type recipes. I have had the real thing, and this is better!  The Shisha Strawberry is perfect for this recipe. Sorry, I can't leave detailed fancy reviews. I can tell you that It's very tasty, and you should mix yourself up a batch.
At first I thought FA marshmallow would be a bad choice for this recipe but after letting it age for 2-3 weeks I was extremely impressed by this mix. Great job!
Vaping this right now @ 70% VG. 3 days in and this is something special..I've never had a Circus Cookie but to me this tastes just like Strawberry Wafers. Thank you for sharing this masterpiece!
Very well done guys! This is a delicious well balanced recipe. I am loving how easy the strawberry shisha fits into the rest of the recipe.

I'm starting to really like this recipe.  It is a pretty straight up strawberry iced cookie so it tastes as described.  This could just be me, but i think the joy is throwing it off a little but also making it as interesting as it is.  I know that doesn't make sense, but it kind of tastes like a eating a strawberry frosted cookie with a little piece of a plain dry saltine cracker.  And at first I didn't like that, but now it is whats making me come back to it.  It's a more unique tasting strawberry cookie.  Especially compared to most "strawberry (anything)" dessert vapes, which all just taste like slightly tweaked versions of the same strawberry vape we've all had a million times. I recommend it and will be making more
I love this recipe! The cookie base is perfectly done and that slathering of strawberry icing is magic and addictive. Added to my faves, as I'll be mixing this one A LOT! Delicious!
